lines.text:
[to Maria]
Now my revenge is complete.
There is a girl...
What girl?
The niece of the monsignor.

[with disgust]
Maria?
Bring her to me.
But what do you want her for? You've got me!

[slaps her in the face]
Bring her to me!

[the Monsignor is asking Paul about his church affiliation]
I don't go to church, sir.

[Surprised]
You don't go to church?
No, sir.
You're not a Protestant, are you?
No, sir.
Thank heaven for that!

[a bit hesitant]
I am an atheist, sir.

[Taken aback]
I beg your pardon?
I'm an atheist, sir.
You mean you deny the existence of God?
I don't deny it. I just don't believe it. It's my own opinion, sir.

[Dracula's first line screaming at the faithless priest]
Who has done this thing! Tell me who has done this thing!

[to Zena]
You have failed me. You must be punished.
The truth? What do you want with that? If you want to be a succes in life forget the truth.
